meanings.definition: A person or thing that fulfills a need or requirement.
meanings.sent1: The superhero was a true fulfiller of justice in the city.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was the fulfiller of knowledge for her students.
meanings.sent3: The diligent worker became the fulfiller of tasks in the office.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the fulfiller of happiness in everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The loyal dog was the fulfiller of companionship for the lonely old man.

meanings.definition: Ingredients added to food to enhance flavor or texture.
meanings.sent1: The spices acted as fulfillers to make the dish more delicious.
meanings.sent2: The chef used various fulfillers to create a perfect balance of taste.
meanings.sent3: The secret ingredient turned out to be the fulfiller of the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The herbs were the fulfillers that transformed the soup into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Each spice served as a fulfiller to elevate the flavors of the meal.

meanings.definition: A substance used to fill gaps or cracks in a surface.
meanings.sent1: The putty worked as a fulfiller to repair the broken vase.
meanings.sent2: The caulking was the fulfiller that sealed the gaps in the window.
meanings.sent3: The glue acted as the fulfiller to mend the torn paper.
meanings.sent4: The cement was the fulfiller that fixed the cracks in the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The plaster served as a fulfiller to patch up the holes in the wall.
